alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hampden; Hampshire; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:28PM EDT until June 14 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE...EASTERN FRANKLIN AND EAST CENTRAL HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Erving, or near Orange, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 407 pm a spotter reported two trees down along with wires in Leverett MA. At 412 pm another spotter reported a tree was down on wires in Whately MA. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Amherst, Greenfield, Orange, Deerfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Athol, Winchendon, Ware, Monson, Montague, Templeton, Granby, Barre and Hadley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
